snippet: We noticed, a few days since, a rumor that appeared in some of the Southern papers, of a movement on the Rio Grande, to get up a revolution in the Mexican State of Tamaulipas. A correspondent of The St. Louis Republican, noticing the report, gives...
lead_paragraph: We noticed, a few days since, a rumor that appeared in some of the Southern papers, of a movement on the Rio Grande, to get up a revolution in the Mexican State of Tamaulipas. A correspondent of The St. Louis Republican, noticing the report, gives some interesting information concerning the character of that country, which we copy as follows:
